main.*:
'''Alan Lewis''' is a student in [[Ross Geller|Ross]]' class who tells him he's in love with him, like [[Ned Morse|Ned]] and tries to get his grades changed also. Alan appears in ''[[The One With Joey's Award]] '' and is played by [[Kyle Howard]].
